attributes.action: Figures on deaths and strains on the nhs caused by Covid prevention methods
attributes.additional_details: We require a comparable figures to see the long term impact on life and the nhs abs to see if Covid methods should continue .
attributes.background: Provide us with figures of preventable deaths, illness, mental health , obesity and drug and alcohol issues and unemployment all caused by Covid prevention methods such as lockdowns and medical restrictions.

rejection.details: Public Health England already publishes statistics on weekly excess mortality in England, including by cause of death: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/excess-mortality-in-england-weekly-reports
